verses.verse: "All <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> that I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> you shall be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> [to give] to your forefathers.

"And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has led <S%H1980><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> that He might humble <S%H6031><s%> you, testing <S%H5254><s%> you, to know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H834><s%> was in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> whether you would keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not.

"And He humbled <S%H6031><s%> you and let you be hungry, <S%H7456><s%> and fed <S%H398><s%> you with manna <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did not know, <S%H3045><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did your fathers know, <S%H1><s%> that He might make you understand <S%H3045><s%> that man <S%H3045><s%> does not live <S%H120><s%> by bread <S%H2421><s%> alone, <S%H3899><s%> but man <S%H905><s%> lives <S%H120><s%> by everything <S%H2421><s%> that proceeds <S%H3605><s%> out of the mouth <S%H4161><s%> of the Lord. <S%H6310><s%>
"Your clothing <S%H8071><s%> did not wear <S%H1086><s%> out on you, nor <S%H3808><s%> did your foot <S%H7272><s%> swell <S%H1216><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

"Thus you are to know <S%H3045><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> was disciplining <S%H3256><s%> you just <S%H9201><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> disciplines <S%H3256><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
"Therefore, you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in His ways <S%H1870><s%> and to fear <S%H3372><s%> Him.

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is bringing <S%H935><s%> you into a good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> of fountains <S%H9407><s%> and springs, <S%H8415><s%> flowing <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> in valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills; <S%H2022><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> and barley, <S%H8184><s%> of vines <S%H1612><s%> and fig <S%H8384><s%> trees <S%H8384><s%> and pomegranates, <S%H7416><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of olive <S%H2132><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarcity, <S%H4544><s%> in which you shall not lack <S%H2637><s%> anything; <S%H3605><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> are iron, <S%H1270><s%> and out of whose hills <S%H2022><s%> you can dig <S%H2672><s%> copper. <S%H5178><s%>

"When you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> you shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

"Beware <S%H8104><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> by not keeping <S%H8104><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today; <S%H3117><s%>
lest, <S%H6435><s%> when you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> and have built <S%H1129><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> [in them],

and when your herds <S%H1241><s%> and your flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and your silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have multiplies, <S%H7235><s%>

then your heart <S%H3824><s%> becomes <S%H7311><s%> proud, <S%H7311><s%> and you forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>

"He led <S%H1980><s%> you through the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> [with its] fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H8314><s%> and scorpions <S%H6137><s%> and thirsty <S%H6774><s%> ground <S%H6774><s%> where <S%H834><s%> there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> He brought <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for you out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint. <S%H2496><s%>

"In the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> He fed <S%H398><s%> you manna <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers did not know, <S%H1><s%> that He might humble <S%H3045><s%> you and that He might test <S%H6031><s%> you, to do <S%H5254><s%> good <S%H3190><s%> for you in the end. <S%H3190><s%>

"Otherwise, you may say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> 'My power <S%H3581><s%> and the strength <S%H6108><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> wealth. <S%H2428><s%>'

"But you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> for it is He who is giving <S%H5414><s%> you power <S%H3581><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> wealth, <S%H2428><s%> that He may confirm <S%H6965><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, as [it is] this <S%H1><s%> day. <S%H2088><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about if <S%H518><s%> you ever <S%H7911><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them and worship <S%H7812><s%> them, I testify <S%H5749><s%> against you today <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely perish.

"Like the nations <S%H1471><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> makes to perish before <S%H6><s%> <S%H6><s%> you, so <S%H4480><s%> you shall perish; because <S%H6440><s%> you would not listen <S%H3651><s%> to the voice <S%H6><s%> of the Lord <S%H6118><s%> your God. <S%H8085><s%>
